title: Per capita COâ‚‚ emissions vs. per capita energy consumption
subtitle: Emissions from [fossil fuels and industry](#dod:fossilemissions) are included. Land-use change emissions are not included. [Primary energy](#dod:primaryenergy) is measured in [kilowatt-hours](#dod:watt-hours) per person, using the [substitution method](#dod:substitutionmethod).
